channel.description: Store your users across multiple tenants Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Change title, move definitions and theory of tenants and multi-tenants to Learn > OIDC > Tenants. This page is purely about helping the reader to understand and choose between the different ways to implement multi-tenant apps. Hub and spoke, etc. Links to original docs: - Multi-tenant solutions: https://developer.
